docs.lead_paragraph: OK, so the CBO score for the 3-committee House health care plan is in: $1 trillion over the next decade for 97 percent coverage of legal residents.
docs.abstract: OK, so the CBO score for the 3-committee House health care plan is in: $1 trillion over the next decade for 97 percent coverage of legal residents. That's a bargain: the catastrophe of being ill without insurance, the fear of losing insurance, all ended - for much less than the Bush administration's useless $1.35 trillion [...]
docs.snippet: OK, so the CBO score for the 3-committee House health care plan is in: $1 trillion over the next decade for 97 percent coverage of legal residents. That's a bargain: the catastrophe of being ill without insurance, the fear of losing insurance, all...

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON -- House Democrats have proposed an income surtax on the highest wage-earners to help pay for a sweeping overhaul of the nation's health care system. The proposal, which has little support in the Senate, would generate roughly $550 billion over 10 years.

headline.main: House Democrats Provide Income Surtax Details

docs.abstract: Details on the income surtax proposed by House Democrats to pay for health care reform, from the Ways and Means Committee.
docs.snippet: Details on the income surtax proposed by House Democrats to pay for health care reform, from the Ways and Means Committee.

headline.main: Taking a Bite Out of Health Care Spending

docs.abstract: The growth rate in veterinary spending has kept apace with that for human health care spending. What are the implications for controlling medical costs?
docs.snippet: The growth rate in veterinary spending has kept apace with that for human health care spending. What are the implications for controlling medical costs?

docs.lead_paragraph: House Democrats are preparing on Tuesday afternoon to unveil a full draft of their sweeping health care legislation, including an income surtax on the country's highest wage-earners to help pay the 10-year, roughly $1 trillion cost of the measure.

headline.main: House Democrats to Unveil Health Care Bill

docs.abstract: The sweeping health care legislation, to be unveiled this afternoon, includes an income surtax on the country's highest wage-earners to help pay the 10-year, roughly $1 trillion cost of the measure.
docs.snippet: The sweeping health care legislation, to be unveiled this afternoon, includes an income surtax on the country's highest wage-earners to help pay the 10-year, roughly $1 trillion cost of the measure.

docs.lead_paragraph: The president has chosen as surgeon general Dr. Regina M. Benjamin, who has tended to the poor in Alabama when not being knocked off course by hurricanes.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama summoned top Democrats to the White House to urge them to stick to his legislative timetable — he wants Congress to pass bills before the August recess.

headline.sub: ‘Don’t Bet Against Us,’ He Tells Doubters ;

docs.lead_paragraph: Lexmark has announced a fleet of new wireless inkjet printers for consumers and small businesses that feature new photo-printing capabilities and several environmentally friendly functions that aim to save paper and energy.

headline.main: Lexmark Revamps Its Inkjet Printer Line

docs.abstract: Lexmark announces eight new all-in-one inkjet printers.
docs.snippet: Lexmark announces eight new all-in-one inkjet printers.

docs.lead_paragraph: When Jane Austin, a retired schoolteacher from Rockford, Ill., suddenly became a widow at age 69, her older brother called from Florida to warn her about "all those old guys who are looking for a nurse . . . or an insurance settlement."

headline.main: With Friends Aplenty, Many Widows Choose Singlehood

docs.abstract: Many older women are adept at building social networks that obviate the need for companionship through remarriage.
docs.snippet: Many older women are adept at building social networks that obviate the need for companionship through remarriage.
